codexes.name: Accelerating Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Core Skills increase your Attack Speed by [10-30%] for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aphotic Aspect
codexes.description: Skeletal Priests empower your Skeletal Warriors' attacks to deal Shadow Damage and have a [5-25%] chance to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Abundant Energy
codexes.description: Crackling Energy has a [35-55%] chance to deal x40% increased damage and chain to an additional enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Accursed Touch
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Up to a [20-40%] chance for your Skills to inflict Vampiric Curse on enemies. Enemies afflicted with Vampiric Curse are also Vulnerable.

Vampiric Curse's stored souls deal [20-60%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Adaptability
codexes.description:
When cast below 50% Maximum Resource, Basic Skills generate 3 of your
Primary Resource, once per cast.

When cast at or above 50% Maximum Resource, Basic Skills deal x [20-100%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Alacrity
codexes.description: Your Defensive Skills Cooldown [10-70%] faster while moving.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Charge
codexes.description: Charge calls forth 4 Ancients who also Charge, dealing x [20-40%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Echoes
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging enemies with Leap, Upheaval, or Whirlwind have up to a [45-65%] chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Force
codexes.description: Hammer of the Ancients quakes outward for x [5-25%] increased damage. This bonus is doubled against Bosses.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancient Flame
codexes.description: While both bonuses from Esu's Ferocity Key Passive are active, your Attack Speed is increased by [35-55%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Anemia
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging Bleeding or Vulnerable enemies has a [15-35%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Anger Management
codexes.description: While above [55-40] Fury, you are Berserk, but lose 2 Fury per second.

codexes.name: Aspect of Anticline Burst
codexes.description: Stone Burst deals x [15-35%] increased damage and when Cast at or above 75 Spirit, it is immediately at its maximum size.

codexes.name: Aspect of Apprehension
codexes.description: Once an enemy is Slowed by at least 80%, they also become Feared for 3 seconds. You deal [25-40%] increased damage to Feared enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Armageddon
codexes.description: A hail of Meteorites falls during Inferno, dealing [X] Fire Damage on impact. Your Meteorites Immobilize enemies for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Arrow Storms
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Your Marksman and Cutthroat Skills have up to a 25% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms deal [45-65%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Artful Initiative
codexes.description:
When you spend 75 Energy you release a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [X] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.

Your Stun Grenades deal [25-45%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Audacity
codexes.description: When there are at least 5 Close enemies, Stun them for [2.5-4.5] seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Avoidance
codexes.description: Whenever an enemy hits you, your Dodge Chance against that enemy increases by [4-8%] . Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Berserk Fury
codexes.description: You gain [1-8] Fury per second while Berserking.

codexes.name: Aspect of Berserk Ripping
codexes.description: Dealing direct damage while Berserking inflicts [15-35%] of the Base damage as additional Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Binding Embers
codexes.description: Flame Shield grants you unhindered for its duration. Enemies you move through while Flame Shield is active are Immobilized for [1.5-3.5] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Binding Morass
codexes.description: Close enemies or those you deal indirect damage to are Slowed by [30-70]% for 3 seconds. You deal 20% increased damage to Slowed enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Biting Cold
codexes.description: When you Freeze an enemy there is a [25-45%] chance to make them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Branching Volleys
codexes.description: Increase the damage of arrows that ricochet from Barrage from 40% to [50-90%] . Barrage's arrows have a [30-70%] chance to split into 2 arrows whenever they ricochet.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bristling Vengeance
codexes.description: Payback now echoes forward and additionally deals [100-140%] of your Thorns damage to enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bul-Kathos
codexes.description: Leap creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes, you gain [10-30%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Burning Rage
codexes.description: While Berserking, you deal [X] Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bursting Bones
codexes.description: When a segment of Bone Prison is destroyed or expires, it deals [X] damage in an area around itself.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bursting Venoms
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Poison Imbued Skills have up to a 15% chance to create a toxic pool that deals [X] Poisoning damage over 3 seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool, your Poison Imbuement Skill has no Cooldown and no charge limit.

codexes.name: Aspect of Charged Flash
codexes.description: After Charged Bolts hits enemies 50 times, your next 3 casts of Charged Bolts becomes waves that pierce and deal [X] Critical Shock Damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Combined Strikes
codexes.description: Each different Basic Skill you cast increases all of your damage by [10-30%] for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Concentration
codexes.description: Casting a Conjuration Skill grants you [15-25%] Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Concussive Strikes
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy has up to a 20% chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.

You deal x [5-25%] increased damage to Dazed enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Conflagration
codexes.description:
While channeling Incinerate, your Burning damage is increased by x [25-40%] .

Enemies damaged by Incinerate explode, Burning all surrounding enemies for [X] over 6 seconds. Can only occur once every 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Control
codexes.description: You deal x [20-35%] more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Corruption
codexes.description: Your Imbuement Skill effects have x [25-45%] increased potency against Vulnerable enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Creeping Death
codexes.description: You deal x [5-20%] increased damage over time to enemies for each different Crowd Control effect they're afflicted by. Unstoppable enemies and Staggered Bosses take x [10-40%] increased damage over time from you instead.

codexes.name: Aspect of Creeping Mist
codexes.description: Gain [20-40%] Evade Cooldown Reduction. You can now Evade during Blood Mist, traveling twice as far. Entering or exiting Blood Mist resets your Evade Cooldown.

codexes.name: Aspect of Cruel Sustenance
codexes.description: Explosions from the Victimize Key Passive Heal you for [X] Life for each enemy damaged, up to a maximum of [X] Life.

codexes.name: Aspect of Cyclonic Force
codexes.description: Cyclone Armor also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, Cyclone Armor will be applied to all Nearby Allies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Decay
codexes.description: Each time the Shadowblight Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next Shadowblight's damage within 10 seconds by x [30-50%] , stacking up to 5 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Deflection
codexes.description: While active, Counterattack reflects incoming Razor Wings back out again. Other Small Missiles arer also deflected back at enemies and deal [25-32%] of Counterattack's Base damage on impact.

codexes.name: Aspect of Disobedience
codexes.description: You gain [0.4-0.8%] increased Armor for 4 seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to [25-40%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Earthquakes
codexes.description: Ground Stomp creates an Earthquake damaging enemies for [X] Physical Damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes, you deal x [10-30%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Efficiency
codexes.description: Casting a Basic Skill reduces the Mana cost of your next Core or Mastery Skill by [35-55%] .

codexes.name: Aspect Of Elemental Acuity
codexes.description: Casting a Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skill increases your Mana Regeneration by [10-25%] for 5 seconds, once per Element. At maximum stacks, the total bonus is increased to [60-150%] for 10 seconds, but all stacks expire after the duration.

codexes.name: Aspect of Elemental Constellation
codexes.description: Casting Pyromancy, Shock, and Frost Skills conjures a matching Elemental Dagger around you that pierces through enemies dealing [X] damage after 3 seconds. The damage increases by 100% per matching elemental skill you cast.

codexes.name: Aspect of Elements
codexes.description:
Gain x [15-35%] increased damage to a set of damage types for 7 seconds. This effect alternates between 2 sets:
• Fire, Lightning, and Physical.
• Cold, Poison, and Shadow.

codexes.name: Aspect of Elusive Menace
codexes.description: While you have both bonuses from the Close Quarters Combat Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by [4-8%] whenever you're hit by an enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Empowered Feathers
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Eagle Skills have up to a [25-32%] chance to summon a Spirit Feather. You can collect Spirit Feathers to reduce your Mobility Skill Cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Empowering Reaper
codexes.description: Damaging enemies with Sever has a [15-35%] chance to spawn a pool of Blight under the target that deals x [60-140%] bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Encircling Blades
codexes.description: Flurry damages enemies in a circle around you and deals x [25-45%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Encroaching Wrath
codexes.description: After spending 100 Fury, your next Weapon Mastery Skills within 5 seconds deals x [40-80%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Endurance
codexes.description: Your Resolve has a [2-6%] chance to not be lost when you are hit for each stack of Ferocity you have.

codexes.name: Aspect of Engulfing Flames
codexes.description: You deal x6% increased Burning damage to enemies for each second they remain Burning, up to x30% after 5 seconds. Additionally, you deal x [10-30%] increased Burning damage to enemies that are not Healthy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Exhilaration
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Hitting a Vulnerable enemy has up to a [15-35%] chance to reduce your Evade Cooldown by 5 seconds. Each stack of Ferocity you have increases this chance by 3%.

codexes.name: Aspect of Explosive Mist
codexes.description: Blood Mist triggers Corpse Explosion on surrounding Corpses. When Blood Mist detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by [0.1-0.8] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Explosive Verve
codexes.description: Your Grenade Skills count as Trap Skills. Whenever you arm a Trap or drop Grenades, you gain [10-30%] increased Movement speed for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Exposed Flesh
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10% chance to generate [35-55] Essence when hitting a Vulnerable enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Falling Feathers
codexes.description: Moving with a Mobility Skill or Evade drops Spirit Feathers along you which each deal [X] Lightning damage on impact.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fel Gluttony
codexes.description: Your Golem Active also causes your Golem to erupt, dealing [X] Physical damage to surrounding enemies. Your Golem consumes Corpses to reduce its remaining Cooldown by 1 second.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fevered Mauling
codexes.description: When you hit at least 1 enemy with Maul, increase its Attack Speed by [1-3%] and you gain [1-5%] Damage reduction for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fierce Winds
codexes.description:
Your Shout Skills create 3 Dust Devils that deal [X] damage to enemies along their path.
Your Dust Devils are [5-25%] bigger and deal 1% increased damage for each 1% their size is increased.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Flaming Rampage
codexes.description: Charge gains an additional Charge. Each target hit by it explodes for [X] Fire damage to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fleet Wings
codexes.description:
Razor Wings is now also an Incarnate Skill with:
Passive: You are Unhindered.
Active: You gain [15-35%] increased Movement Speed per active Razor Wing.

codexes.name: Aspect of Forest Power
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Gorilla Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically grant you a Barrier for 25% of your Maximum Life which increases your Armor and Maximum Resistances by [5-25%] while active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fortune
codexes.description: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by [10-30%] while you have a Barrier active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Forward Momentum
codexes.description: Knocking Back an enemy grants [25-45%] Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frenzied Dead
codexes.description: Each time one of your Minions damages an enemy, they gain [10-18%] Attack Speed for 3 seconds, up to [30-54%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Frosty Strides
codexes.description: While below [45-60%] Life, Evade Freezes Close enemies, deals [X] Cold Damage to them, and makes them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Memories
codexes.description: The Avalanche Key Passive now applies to 2 additional casts.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Orbit
codexes.description: Frozen Orb explodes 2 additional times at its destination for [45-65%] of its damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Giant Strides
codexes.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Leap by [1.3-3.5] seconds per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 7 seconds. Hitting a Boss with Leap provides the maximum cooldown reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Gore Quills
codexes.description: Casting Blood Lance will consume Blood Orbs to also conjure lances from them. Each additional Blood Lance deals [20-60%] of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Grasping Veins
codexes.description: Gain [5-25%] increased Critical Strike Chance for 6 seconds when you cast Corpse Tendrils. You deal x [10-50%] bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by Corpse Tendrils for 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Grasping Whirlwind
codexes.description: Whirlwind periodically Pulls enemies to you.

codexes.name: Aspect of Hardened Bones
codexes.description: You and your Minions gain [10-30%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Haste
codexes.description: Every second while moving gain [10-30%] Bonus Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to [30-90%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Herculean Spectacle
codexes.description: Mighty Throw deals [15-35%] increased damage and hurls another 2 weapons.

codexes.name: Aspect of Hungry Blood
codexes.description: Each cast of Blood Lance will launch an additional Blood Lance at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing [40-80%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Imitated Imbuement
codexes.description: Your Shadow Clones also mimic the Imbuements applied to your Skills. Casting an Imbuement Skill grants your active Shadow Clone x [5-25%] increased damage for 9 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Inevitable Fate
codexes.description: When an enemy falls below 35% Life while afflicted with any of your damage over time effects, an explosion occurs every 7 seconds, dealing [X] damage for each element they're afflicted by.

codexes.name: Aspect of Infestation
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Centipede Skills have up to a 35% chance to spawn a Pestilent Swarm from the target which deals [X] Poison damage per hit. Pestilent Swarms now also deal 100% of their Base damage as Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Inner Calm
codexes.description: Deal x [5-13%] increased damage. Triple this bonus after standing still for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Interdiction
codexes.description: Gain [1-15%] Block Chance per Resolve stack.

codexes.name: Aspect of Invigorating Will
codexes.description: Losing a stack of Resolve has a 10% chance to Heal you for [5-11%] of your Maximum Life.

codexes.name: Aspect of Iron Rain
codexes.description: Smoke Grenade has a [35-55%] chance to create an Arrow Storm where it explodes, dealing [X] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms continuously apply Vulnerable.

codexes.name: Aspect of Kinetic Suppression
codexes.description: Casting a Non-Basic Mobility Skill grants [1-8] Resolve and causes your next Concussive Stomp to strike in a circle.

codexes.name: Aspect of Layered Wards
codexes.description: Your Block Reduction is increased by [10-30%] while you have a Barrier.

codexes.name: Aspect of Lethal Dusk
codexes.description: Evading through an enemy infected by Shadow Imbuement grants Stealth for 4 seconds. Breaking Stealth Heals you for [10-30%] of your Maximum Life.

codexes.name: Aspect of Limitless Rage
codexes.description: Each point of Fury you generate while at Maximum Fury grants your next Core Skill within 5 seconds x [1-3%] increased damage, up to 15 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Mending Stone
codexes.description: The duration of Earthen Bulwark is increased by 6 seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with a Skill replenishes [X] of your active Earthen Bulwark's Barrier.

codexes.name: Aspect of Metamorphic Stone
codexes.description: Boulder is now a Core Skill and costs 40 Spirit to cast dealing [90-130%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Metamorphosis
codexes.description: When you Evade you turn into a cloud of bats, becoming Unstoppable for 2.5 seconds. Enemies along your path take [X] Physical damage and are inflicted with Vampiric Curse. Evade's Cooldown is increased by [10-4] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Might
codexes.description: Basic Skills grant 20% Damage Reduction for [2-10] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Momentum
codexes.description: After you Evade, your next Core Skill dashes to your target and does [15-35%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Natural Balance
codexes.description:
Casting a Storm Skill grants your Earth Skills [30-50%] Critical Strike Damage for 4 seconds.

Casting an Earth Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of Storm Skills by [8-13%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Nature's Savagery
codexes.description: Werewolf Skills function as Storm Skills and Werebear Skills function as Earth Skills for the Nature's Fury Key Passive.

codexes.name: Aspect of Nebulous Brews
codexes.description: Using a Healing Potion grants [35-55%] Movement Speed for 3 seconds. After moving 20 meters, you spawn a Healing Potion.

codexes.name: Aspect of Noxious Ice
codexes.description: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20% per second. You deal x [20-40%] additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Numbing Wrath
codexes.description: Each point of Fury generated while at Maximum Fury grants [X] Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of Occult Dominion
codexes.description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.

codexes.name: Aspect of Overheating
codexes.description: After channeling Incinerate for 2 seconds it deals [X] Critical Fire damage per second for 5 seconds. Casting Incinerate refreshes and maintains this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Overwhelming Currents
codexes.description: Unstable Currents has a [25-45%] chance to cast an additional Shock Skill.

codexes.name: Aspect of Perpetual Stomping
codexes.description: Damaging an enemy with Kick or Ground Stomp resets Leap's Cooldown.

codexes.name: Aspect of Pestilence
codexes.description: Stinger spawns a Pestilence Swarm at its target location which deals [35-75%] of Stinger's Base damage per hit. Pestilent Swarms now last 100% longer and spiral outwards.

codexes.name: Aspect of Pestilent Points
codexes.description: Every 3rd cast of Puncture is Poison Imbued with [105-165%] of normal potency.

codexes.name: Aspect of Piercing Cold
codexes.description: Ice Shards pierce [3-19] times, dealing [25-5%] less damage per subsequent enemy hit.

codexes.name: Aspect of Piercing Static
codexes.description: Charged Bolts pierce, but deal x [70-30%] less damage to targets hit after the first.

codexes.name: Aspect of Plains Power
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Jaguar Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to keep your Ferocity at Maximum and increase your damage by [3-7%] per stack while you remain within.

codexes.name: Aspect of Plunging Darkness
codexes.description: Bone Prison spawns a pool of Blight that deals x [80-140%] bonus damage over 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Potent Blood
codexes.description: Blood Orbs grant [10-30] Essence.

codexes.name: Aspect of Potent Exchange
codexes.description: Gain 1 Resolve when you Dodge an attack. Your Potency Skills consume 2 Resolve to deal [15-55%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Quickening Fog
codexes.description: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Smoke Grenades reduce Dash's cooldown by [0.5-0.7] seconds for each enemy hit, up to [1.50-2.10] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Quicksand
codexes.description: Damage from Earth Skills Slow enemies hit by [20-60%] for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Rallying Reversal
codexes.description: You have [25-60%] chance to gain 1 Ferocity when you Crowd Control an enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Rathma's Chosen
codexes.description: Whenever your Blood Skills Overpower you gain [35-55%] Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Reactive Armor
codexes.description: Gain 10% Block Chance. Blocking an attack from a Close enemy has a [30-70%] chance to cast a free Concussive Stomp at them.

codexes.name: Aspect of Reanimation
codexes.description: Your Minions gain increased damage while alive, up to x [25-45%] after 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Recalling Feathers
codexes.description: Casting a Focus Skill recalls Nearby Spirit Feathers which deal [X] Lightning damage to enemies along their way. If there are no Nearby Spirit Feathers, the cast instead spawns 15 randomly around you.

codexes.name: Aspect of Redirected Force
codexes.description: Gain increased Critical Strike Damage equal [30-70%] of your Block Chance. Blocking doubles this bonus for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Repeating
codexes.description: Rapid Fire has a [30-50%] chance to ricochet to another target.

codexes.name: Aspect of Retaliation
codexes.description: Your Core Skills deal up to [25-45%] increased damage based on your amount of Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of Retribution
codexes.description:
Distant enemies have a 10% chance to be Stunned for 2 seconds when they hit you.

You deal x [15-35%] increased damage to Stunned and Knocked Down enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Searing Wards
codexes.description: After spending [125-65] Mana your next Firewall is free to cast and will destroy incoming Small Missiles.

codexes.name: Aspect of Serration
codexes.description: The Ossified Essence Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your Bone Skills by x1% per Essence above 50, up to x [25-45%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Shared Misery
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a [35-55%] chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shattered Defenses
codexes.description: Stone Burst causes enemies to take x [30-50%] increased damage from your other Skills for 5 seconds. Stone Burst's Spirit cost is reduced by 10.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shattered Stars
codexes.description: Meteorites fall around Meteor, dealing [30-50%] of Meteor's damage. Your Meteorites additionally Burn enemies they hit for [X] damage over 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shattering Steel
codexes.description: Steel Grasp and Iron Maelstrom launch up to 10 metal shards that deal [X] Physical damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shielding Storm
codexes.description: Each time that Bone Storm damages an enemy, gain a Barrier equal to [1-8%] of your Maximum Life for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shredding Blades
codexes.description: Ice Blades' chance to apply Vulnerable is increased by 20% and the Vulnerable duration is increased by 4 seconds. You gain x [15-35%] Vulnerable Damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Simple Reprisal
codexes.description: When you cast the 3rd attack of your Basic Skills you have a [10-30%] chance to unleash Payback.

codexes.name: Aspect of Singed Extremities
codexes.description: After lmmobilize or Stun wears off, enemies are Slowed by [45-65%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Siphoned Victuals
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Non-Basic Skill has a [5-25%] chance to drop a Healing Potion.

codexes.name: Aspect of Sky Power
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to create a Mystical Circle for 10 seconds.
Casting an Eagle Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to move with you and explode for [X] Lightning damage when you Evade.

codexes.name: Aspect of Slaughter
codexes.description: You gain 20% Movement speed. Lose this bonus for [5.0-2.0] seconds after taking damage from a Close Enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Sly Steps
codexes.description: When you would accumulate 50% of your Maximum Life lost, you automatically cast an equipped Defensive, Subterfuge or Macabre Skill before receiving damage. Can only occur once every [45-30] seconds and cannot cast Mobility Skills.

codexes.name: Aspect of Soil Power
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Centipede Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically apply [X] Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to enemies within while extending any Crowd Controls affecting them.

codexes.name: Aspect of Splintering Energy
codexes.description: Critical Hits with Lightning Spear cause Lightning to arc from it dealing [X] damage to its target and up to 5 other enemies. This damage is increased by your Critical Strike Damage Bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Splintering Shards
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 100% chance when hitting or killing a Frozen enemy to create an ice splinter that fires away from them dealing [X] Cold damage and Chilling for 20-30%.

codexes.name: Aspect of Star Shards
codexes.description: Knives from Dance of Knives have a 50% chance to shatter into 6 shards of metal on hit, dealing [X Physical damage. Dance of Knives now spends Combo Points, granting up to 3 additional Charges that can exceed the Maximum.
